EmailTemplate.name: CS Case Closure Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your ticket {!Case.CaseNumber} with Subject {!Case.Subject} is now resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
Your ticket for {!Case.Subject} has been resolved now with the closing reason as {!Case.Additional_Comments__c}.
If the issue still persists, or if you want to reopen the ticket at a later time for any reason please reply back to this email. For any new issues, please submit a new ticket via the Contact us link from any of our websites where you are facing issue. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact your Cummins account representative or care.cummins.com. This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
